# Ameryka, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Ameryka}}

Ameryka  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Olsztynek, within Olsztyn County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north-east of Olsztynek and  south-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
It is the site of a children's rehabilitation hospital.
